comments.body: What about healthz endpoints for the controller manager, etc?

Those are generally done via the insecure port that is exposed on localhost. If you do a typical configuration (master components on one machine) then there isn't any cross-machine communication for the controller manager -> master or from the master health checking the controller manager.
